alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 17 at 12:38AM EST until January 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight and Newport News Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/04 AM 3.6 1.4 1.7 1 NONE 17/04 PM 3.3 1.1 1.7 1 NONE 18/06 AM 3.3 1.1 1.3 1 NONE 18/05 PM 2.8 0.6 1.3 1 NONE 19/07 AM 3.3 1.1 1.3 1 NONE 19/07 PM 2.7 0.5 1.3 1 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/01 AM 3.9 1.1 1.4 3 NONE 17/02 PM 3.6 0.8 1.4 1-2 NONE 18/02 AM 3.5 0.7 1.0 2 NONE 18/03 PM 2.9 0.1 0.9 1 NONE 19/03 AM 3.7 0.9 1.2 1 NONE 19/03 PM 3.2 0.4 1.4 1-2 NONE FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/01 AM 4.3 1.5 1.7 3 NONE 17/02 PM 3.6 0.8 1.3 1-2 NONE 18/02 AM 3.4 0.6 0.8 2 NONE 18/03 PM 2.8 0.0 0.7 1 NONE 19/04 AM 3.6 0.8 1.0 1 NONE 19/04 PM 3.1 0.3 1.1 1-2 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
